recipes.title: Scrambled Eggs
recipes.instructions: Beat eggs with milk, salt, and pepper. Heat butter in a non-stick pan over medium-low heat. Pour in eggs and gently stir continuously until set but still creamy. Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl. In another bowl, whisk egg, milk, and melted butter. Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed. Cook on a greased griddle over medium heat until bubbles form and edges look set. Flip and cook until golden brown.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice. Place cheese between bread slices with buttered sides facing out. Cook in a skillet over medium heat until golden brown on both sides and cheese is melted.

recipes.title: Spaghetti with Garlic and Oil
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions. Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a large skillet and sauté garlic until golden. Add red pepper flakes. Drain pasta and toss with garlic oil. Season with salt and garnish with parsley.

recipes.title: French Toast
recipes.instructions: Whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon. Dip bread slices in mixture, coating both sides. Cook in buttered skillet over medium heat until golden brown on both sides. Serve with syrup or powdered sugar.

recipes.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.instructions: Bring broth to a boil. Add vegetables and cook for 5 minutes. Add noodles and cook according to package directions. Stir in chicken and season with salt and pepper. Simmer for 2-3 minutes until heated through.

recipes.title: Quesadillas
recipes.instructions: Place cheese and meat (if using) on one tortilla. Top with second tortilla. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Cook quesadilla for 2-3 minutes per side until golden and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges.

recipes.title: Baked Potato
ingredients: Butter, sour cream, and chives for serving
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F. Scrub potatoes and poke holes with a fork. Rub with oil and salt. Bake for 45-60 minutes until tender. Cut open and fluff with a fork. Serve with desired toppings.

recipes.title: Tuna Salad
recipes.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl and mix well. Adjust seasoning to taste. Serve on bread, crackers, or over lettuce.

recipes.title: Banana Bread
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Mix melted butter with mashed bananas. Stir in sugar, egg, and vanilla. Add baking soda and salt. Mix in flour until just combined. Pour into greased loaf pan and bake for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean.

recipes.title: Fried Rice
recipes.instructions: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet. Scramble eggs and remove from pan. Heat remaining oil, add rice and vegetables. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes. Add eggs back to pan with soy sauce and sesame oil. Garnish with green onions.

recipes.title: Meatloaf
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Mix all ingredients except ketchup. Shape into a loaf and place in a baking dish. Spread ketchup on top. Bake for 45-55 minutes until internal temperature reaches 160°F.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.instructions: Whisk together mayonnaise, lemon juice, garlic, Worcestershire sauce, and pepper for dressing. Toss lettuce with dressing. Top with parmesan cheese and croutons.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
ingredients: Sour cream and salsa for serving
recipes.instructions: Brown ground beef in a skillet. Add taco seasoning and water according to package directions. Simmer until thickened. Warm taco shells and fill with meat mixture. Top with lettuce, cheese, tomato, and desired condiments.

recipes.title: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Mix breadcrumbs and parmesan. Dip chicken in eggs, then breadcrumb mixture. Heat oil in a skillet and brown chicken on both sides. Transfer to baking dish, top with marinara and mozzarella. Bake 20-25 minutes until chicken is cooked through.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F. Mix flour, baking soda, and salt. In another bowl, cream butter and sugars. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Gradually mix in flour mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop rounded tablespoons onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake 9-11 minutes until golden brown.

recipes.title: Mashed Potatoes
recipes.instructions: Boil potatoes in salted water until tender, about 15-20 minutes. Drain and return to pot. Mash with butter and gradually add milk until desired consistency. Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Chicken Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over high heat. Add chicken and cook until no longer pink. Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes. Mix soy sauce, cornstarch, and spices with 2 tablespoons water. Add to pan and stir until sauce thickens.

recipes.title: Vegetable Soup
recipes.instructions: Bring broth to a boil in a large pot. Add all vegetables and herbs. Simmer for 20-25 minutes until vegetables are tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.title: Sloppy Joes
recipes.instructions: Brown ground beef and onion in a skillet. Drain fat. Add ketchup, brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, mustard, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 10 minutes until thickened. Serve on hamburger buns.

recipes.title: Baked Fish
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Place fish in a baking dish. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with garlic, herbs, salt, and pepper. Top with lemon slices. Bake for 15-20 minutes until fish flakes easily with a fork.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
ingredients: 4 bell peppers, tops cut off and seeds removed
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Brown ground beef with onion. Mix with rice, half the tomato sauce, and seasonings. Stuff peppers with mixture. Place in baking dish with remaining tomato sauce. Cover and bake 35-40 minutes. Top with cheese and bake 5 more minutes.

recipes.title: Chicken Salad
recipes.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl and mix well. Adjust seasoning to taste. Chill for at least 30 minutes before serving. Serve on bread, crackers, or over lettuce.

recipes.title: Shepherd's Pie
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Brown meat with onion and carrots. Add tomato paste, broth, and peas. Simmer until thickened. Transfer to baking dish. Top with mashed potatoes and cheese. Bake 20-25 minutes until golden.

recipes.title: Chicken Noodle Casserole
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Mix noodles, chicken, soup, milk, vegetables, and half the cheese. Transfer to greased baking dish. Top with remaining cheese and breadcrumbs. Bake 25-30 minutes until bubbly.

recipes.title: Beef and Rice Skillet
recipes.instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet. Add onion and bell pepper, cook until softened. Stir in rice, broth, tomatoes, and seasonings. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer covered for 20 minutes until rice is tender.

recipes.title: Tuna Casserole
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Mix noodles, tuna, soup, milk, peas, and cheese. Transfer to greased baking dish. Top with crushed crackers. Bake 25-30 minutes until heated through and golden on top.

recipes.title: Chicken Teriyaki
recipes.instructions: Mix soy sauce, brown sugar, honey, vinegar, and spices for marinade. Marinate chicken for 30 minutes. Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through, basting with remaining marinade. Let rest 5 minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Beef Chili
recipes.instructions: Brown ground beef with onion in a large pot. Add tomatoes, beans, and all spices. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30-45 minutes, stirring occasionally. Adjust seasoning to taste.

recipes.title: Chicken Pot Pie
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F. Mix chicken, vegetables, soup, milk, salt, and pepper. Pour into pie dish. Cover with pie crust and seal edges. Cut vents in top. Bake 30-35 minutes until crust is golden brown.

recipes.title: Pork Chops
recipes.instructions: Season pork chops with all spices. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook pork chops 4-5 minutes per side until golden brown and internal temperature reaches 145°F. Let rest 3 minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Egg Salad
recipes.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl and mix well. Adjust seasoning to taste. Chill for at least 30 minutes before serving. Serve on bread, crackers, or over lettuce.

recipes.title: Chicken Quesadillas
recipes.instructions: Mix chicken, cheese, bell pepper, and onion. Place mixture on one tortilla and top with second tortilla. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Cook quesadilla 2-3 minutes per side until golden and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.instructions: Cook noodles according to package directions. Heat oil in a large skillet and brown beef strips. Remove beef and sauté onion and mushrooms. Return beef to pan with soup and simmer 10 minutes. Stir in sour cream and serve over noodles.

recipes.title: Chicken Fried Rice
recipes.instructions: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet. Scramble eggs and remove from pan. Heat remaining oil, add rice, chicken, and vegetables. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes. Add eggs back to pan with soy sauce. Garnish with green onions.

recipes.title: Meatball Subs
recipes.instructions: Mix ground beef, breadcrumbs, egg, and onion. Form into meatballs. Brown in a skillet, then add marinara sauce and simmer 15 minutes. Split sub rolls and fill with meatballs and sauce. Top with cheese and broil until melted.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Wrap
recipes.instructions: Warm tortillas slightly. Spread caesar dressing on each tortilla. Add lettuce, chicken, parmesan, and croutons. Roll tightly, tucking in sides. Cut in half and serve immediately.

recipes.title: Pesto Pasta
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Reserve 1/2 cup pasta water before draining. Toss hot pasta with pesto, adding pasta water as needed for consistency. Drizzle with olive oil and top with pine nuts and parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Chicken and Dumplings
recipes.instructions: Bring broth to a boil in a large pot. Add chicken, vegetables, and thyme. Mix biscuit mix with milk to form dough. Drop spoonfuls of dough into simmering broth. Cover and cook 15 minutes without lifting lid. Season with salt and pepper.
